stories.text:
Interested in working closely with a software engineer who has experience ranging from engineering at startups to publishing AI research in a corporate research lab? Apply for a remote part time role with a flexible schedule, approximately 8 hours a week! The work will focus on building and extending apps for the Apple Watch and iPad with the goal of encouraging diverse modes of thinking, reflection, and reverie.

Job expectations: Code reviews for existing and future code Pair programming on features General engineering feedback will be provided for less experienced developers Add specific feature requests, such as: Adding a settings page for app configuration Automatic transcription of audio recordings Editing historical data entries Deep linking from notifications into NavigationViews Creating home screen widgets for watch and phone Accessing data stored in CloudKit from a server

Preferred qualification: >1 year experience of Swift -Experience building SwiftUI applications, ideally across both watch and phone -Own an Apple Watch to test on a physical device

Bonus but not required: Prior experience with specific Swift workflows, otherwise can be learned just in time: -Core Data/CloudKit -PencilKit -Interacting with a backend server -Python for writing simple backend applications -Web development experience using React with Javascript and/or Clojurescript

Compensation rate starts at $30/hr but may increase based on level of experience.

To apply, please fill out this google form: https://forms.gle/vd4NR3tgPyqbZfzs8
stories.title: Part time iOS developer role with an experienced software engineer
